alert.note: Alert for Bullitt; Jefferson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 28 at 3:28PM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT PARTS OF FLOYD...CLARK...JEFFERSON...AND BULLITT COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A snow squall accompanied by winds of up to 25 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. This squall is producing briefly heavy snow at the rate of 1 inch per hour. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 327 PM EST, a snow squall was over New Albany moving southeast at 15 MPH. THIS SQUALL WILL BE NEAR... New Albany around 330 PM EST. Jeffersonville around 335 PM EST. Louisville, St. Dennis and Pleasure Ridge Park around 345 PM EST. Shively around 350 PM EST. Mockingbird Valley around 355 PM EST. Audubon Park, Parkway Village, Rolling Fields, Brownsboro Village and Druid Hills around 400 PM EST. Watterson Park, Woodlawn Park, Seneca Gardens, Strathmoor Village, Norbourne Estates, Richlawn, Kingsley, Strathmoor Manor, Bellewood and Maryhill Estates around 405 PM EST. Beechwood Village, West Buechel, Lynnview, Poplar Hills, Okolona, Springlee, Plymouth Village, Broad Fields and Fairmeade around 410 PM EST. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
